old:
<COL ffdc78>《降臨せし闇》</COL>は最大４人のパーティーで
黒騎士と戦うエクストリームミッションです

先の戦いの後、
より凶悪な存在と化した黒騎士を素早く討伐し
樹内に眠る精霊竜セシリーを守る盾となりましょう
new:
<COL ffdc78>《Onset of Darkness》</COL> 
is an extreme mission in which a party of up to 4 players fight the Black Knight.

After the previous battle, quickly defeat the Black Knight, who has become an even more vicious entity and become the shield that protects Cecily, the spirit dragon lying within the tree!
